  • Optimizing On-call rotations and processes.

  • Conversant with concepts related to RDBMS and NoSQL databases.

Requirements:

  • A collaborative spirit with the ability to work across disciplines to influence, learn, and deliver.

This is an opportunity to be a technical leader. You will work closely with product and business functions to come up with optimal solutions to drive key revenue, growth, and compliance initiatives. You will get an opportunity to work on one of Paypal's most heavily used services to build and support systems that serve tens of millions of requests per day with low latency and high uptime.

  • Have strong business and technical vision and the ability to communicate this vision to multiple stakeholders.

  • Exhibit strong leadership and exceptional technical skills, hands-on programming skills.

details.description:
As a Senior IT System Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, managing, and maintaining an organization's IT systems and infrastructure. Your role will encompass a wide range of tasks, from system architecture design to troubleshooting and resolving complex IT issues. You will work closely with other IT professionals to ensure the organization's IT environment is secure, efficient, and reliable.


Responsibilities:

  • System Design and Architecture:
  • Collaborate with IT architects to design and implement robust IT systems.
  • Assess current systems and propose improvements or enhancements.
  • System Implementation:
  • Install, configure, and maintain servers, networks, and associated hardware and software.
  • Deploy and manage cloud services such as AWS, Azure, and Office 365 Okta.
  • System Administration:
  • Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize system resources.
  • Apply security best practices to protect systems and data.
  • Network Management:
  • Manage and maintain network infrastructure, including switches, routers, and firewalls.
  • Ensure network reliability, security, and performance utilizing industry tools.
  • Software Management:
  • Install, upgrade, and maintain operating systems and software applications using MDM and Active Directory.
  • Perform patch management and software updates.
  • User Support:
  • Provide technical support to end-users and resolve complex technical issues.
  • Train users on new technologies and systems.
  • Documentation:
  • Create and update system documentation, including network diagrams and configuration records.

details.description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Staff Cloud Platform engineer with broad technology experience across cloud architecture, applications development, relational databases, NoSQL databases, data security, and storage to join our cloud platform storage team. In this role, you will be responsible for extending the capabilities of Kubernetes clusters with components and operators at the enterprise scale.


This is an opportunity to use the latest cloud technologies, as you look for ways to improve our internal customer's environments using cloud capabilities. You'll be able to sharpen your skills in DevSecOps and platform technologies such as Kubernetes hosted in public clouds such as AWS, GCP, and Azure while building cloud-agnostic solutions. As a Staff Cloud Platform engineer, you'll identify new opportunities to build cloud-based solutions to help our internal customers meet their evolving needs and set up data storage governance guidelines.


Requirements:

  • Overall 10 to 15 years of working on large-scale, highly distributed services infrastructure at an enterprise level.
  • 6+ Years of experience with containerization and container orchestration tools such as Kubernetes and Docker.
  • 6+ Years of experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or equivalent expertise in Kubernetes-native Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Crossplane, AWS Controllers for Kubernetes or Google Config Connector.
  • Experience with writing Custom Controllers and Custom CRD.
  • Experience with DevOps tools such as ArgoCD, Spinnaker, Jenkins, or GitHub Actions
  • Hands-on experience with all three major public cloud platforms i. e. AWS, GCP, and Azure.
  • Experience with shell scripting and at least 5 years of experience and solid proficiency in at least one programming language - Java, Python, Golang.
  • Very good understanding of database metrics for debugging performance issues and to help in scaling, data modeling, and capacity planning.
  • Experience with the use of version control systems for code management and artifact tracking, including GitHub or JIRA.
  • Experience of integrating monitoring and logging tools, namely Prometheus Grafana and ELK.
  • Experience with deploying and maintaining streaming services such as Kafka, or NATs on a large scale.
  • Solid understanding of NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, ScyllaDB, Clickhouse, and relational databases such as MySQL and Postgres.
  • Experience managing large-scale data on cloud storage and implementing disaster recovery techniques to meet the defined RPO and RTO.
  • Experience with Database Load testing and Benchmarking.

Nice If You Have:

  • Experience with system architecture or microservices architecture.
  • Experience with Service Mesh.
  • Experience with Crossplane.
  • Experience with RESTful web services and related technology.
  • Experience with writing RFCs and technical challenge documentation.
  • Working knowledge and implementation of the Airflow or Dagster.

details.description:
We are seeking a dynamic CRM and Data Analytics Manager to join our innovative real estate startup. In this role, you will be instrumental in managing our Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, analyzing data to drive business decisions, and ensuring seamless lead management.

The ideal candidate will be a tech-savvy professional with a strong background in CRM management, data analytics, and technical support.


Responsibilities:

  • CRM System Management: Oversee and optimize the CRM system to ensure it meets the company's needs. Implement workflow automations, updates, manage system integrations, and ensure data accuracy.
  • Lead Management: Manage and analyze the flow of leads through the CRM system. Track, categorize, and nurture leads to improve conversion rates.
  • Data Analytics and Reporting: Utilize data analytics tools to gather insights from CRM data. Generate reports on sales trends, customer behavior, ROI, and lead management effectiveness to inform business strategies.
  • Data Quality Management: Maintain high standards of data quality in the CRM system. Implement policies for data entry, verification, and cleansing.
  • Technical Support and Training: Provide support to team members for CRM-related issues and conduct training sessions for new users.
  • Strategic Planning and Implementation: Develop and execute a CRM strategy that aligns with the company's overall objectives. Set specific goals for lead generation, customer engagement, and sales conversions.
  • Customer Segmentation and Personalization: Segment customers and leads in the CRM for targeted marketing. Implement personalization strategies to enhance customer engagement.
  • System Customization and Enhancement: Customize the CRM system to fit the specific workflow and business processes. Implement custom fields, workflow automation, and integrate third-party tools.
  • Performance Analysis and Optimization: Analyze the performance of CRM initiatives. Identify areas for improvement and optimize processes for increased efficiency.
  • Stakeholder Engagement and Reporting: Regularly engage with stakeholders to gather feedback and requirements. Provide management with reports on CRM performance and insights.
  • User Experience and Interface Management: Ensure the CRM offers an intuitive user experience and address any user interface improvements.
  • Feedback Loops and Continuous Learning: Establish feedback loops with users and stakeholders for continuous learning and CRM strategy evolution.
  • Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with sales, marketing, and tech teams to align CRM strategies with overall business goals.
  • Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with the latest trends in CRM technologies and data analytics, and recommend improvements to the existing system and processes.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Data Science, or related field. Master's degree preferred.
  • Proven experience in CRM management and data analytics, preferably in the real estate industry.
  • Strong technical skills with experience in CRM platforms (e. g., Salesforce, Zoho, LeadSquared, HubSpot) and data analytics tools like Tableau, R, Excel, etc.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication and training skills, able to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical team members.
  • Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and work under tight deadlines.

details.description:
As one of the primary client-facing members of Emerson, the Enterprise Software Implementation Project Manager is a critical member of the organization. The Enterprise Software Implementation Project Manager is primarily responsible for project delivery and leads a team of Emerson functional and technical resources during the end-to-end implementation of Emerson's enterprise software applications, in accordance with Emerson's contractual obligations, internal processes, and best practices. The Enterprise Software Implementation Project Manager is responsible for tracking, managing, and reporting project financials as well as reviewing and approving project expenses and time. The Enterprise Software Implementation Project Manager ultimately ensures that the project is delivered on time, within budget, to contractual scope, and with the required quality standard, resulting in successful project execution. In addition, the Enterprise Software Implementation Project Manager is also responsible for managing customer expectations and system acceptance. An Enterprise Software Implementation

Project Managers may manage multiple small projects or a handful of medium projects.


With adequate supervision, the Enterprise Software Implementation Project Manager leads and directs projects, which often require considerable resources and high levels of functional integration. Must be familiar with system scope and project objectives, as well as the role and function of each team member, to effectively coordinate the activities and provide leadership to the team. Strong communication skills are absolute for this position. The Enterprise Software Implementation Project Manager must be comfortable in participating and presenting to a variety of audiences (from project teams to executives) and scenarios such as project progress reporting meetings and driving requirements gathering.


Responsibilities:

  • Define project plan, resource plan, budget, milestones, and deliverables in accordance with contractual obligations and Emerson project management methodology and leading practices.
  • Manage project scope, requirements, resources, budget, timelines, and deliverables.
  • Manage day-to-day tasks for Emerson resources and potentially client/3rd party resources.
  • Manage project issues, risks, and defect tracking.
  • Own project status and communications.
  • Establish credibility at all levels within the client and build problem-solving partnerships with clients and colleagues.
  • Enhance the organization by sharing your knowledge and experience with other team members.
  • Communicate effectively and professionally through project status, presentations, client workshops and deliverables- Organize and manage project documents and artifacts so that they can be easily leveraged by other team members.
  • Build the future of Emerson by sharing experience and expertise with new team members through both formal and informal channels.
  • Participate in and contribute to the Emerson Project Management Organization (PMO).
  • Help improve Emerson's project management practice through process improvement, standardization, and project feedback.
  • Look for continuous improvement opportunities for self and Emerson.
  • Build and expand the network at Emerson.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree.
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience managing enterprise IT application implementations.
  • Minimum of 5 years experience in a consultative role on customer-facing projects.
  • Minimum of 5 years experience with either Microsoft Project or other project management tools to track project plans, progress, project financials and other metrics, risks, etc.
  • Proven track record of project delivery across the entire project lifecycle, from project initiation, and planning to execution and closing, while managing the production of business and technical deliverables.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Must be willing and able to travel up to 25%

Preferred skills:

  • Project Management experience with a Big 4' or Global Business and Technology consulting firm.
  • Hands-on experience leading the implementation of Commercial Off The Shelf (COTS) enterprise application projects.
  • Exposure to presales for enterprise application implementations.
  • Prior experience as a Business Analyst or Technical Analyst and hands-on experience in project delivery.
  • Significant process improvement/engineering expertise.
  • Highly professional documentation skills.
  • Experience in the oil & gas industry.
  • PMP certification.
  • Exceptional communication skills, verbal and written.
  • Ability to communicate effectively with different levels of the organization, within one's own and customer organization.
  • Demonstrated ability to influence, conflict management, and do whatever it takes to get the job done.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects, and conflicting priorities and make progress in the face of ambiguity.
  • Comfortable establishing measurable goals and milestones for self and others; including time frames and priorities.
  • Strong conceptual and analytical critical thinking, comfortable managing ambiguity.
  • Team player - willing to take on any task no matter how big or small to meet goals.
  • Commitment to self-improvement - must have a strong drive to learn/stay in touch with industry, application, and project management trends.
  • Takes an interest in developing others, generous with time, knowledge, and experience.
details.title: IT Project Manager

details.description:
Responsibilities:

  • You'll be working with varied and diverse teams to deliver unique and unprecedented solutions across industries.
  • As a Data Scientist, you will be primarily responsible for managing technical projects and helping teams design analytics (or modeling) pipelines that consistently drive solutions to be extensible and produce quality.
  • You are an expert in selected domains and can contrast methods and select appropriate approaches based on the data or analytics problem at hand.
  • Your responsibilities will include, for example:
  • Exploring data and crafting models to answer core business problems
  • Explaining, refining, and crafting model insights and architecture to bring stakeholders through the journey of model building
  • Keeping up with your domain's state of the art & developing familiarity with emerging modeling and data engineering methodologies
  • Advocating application of best practices in modeling, code hygiene, and data engineering
  • Led the development of proprietary statistical techniques, algorithms, or analytical tools on projects and asset development.


Requirements:

  • You are a well-rounded technologist who brings a wealth of real-world experience and Technical background in computer science, data science, machine learning, artificial intelligence, statistics, or other quantitative and computational science
  • Compelling track record of designing and deploying large-scale technical solutions, which deliver tangible, ongoing value including direct experience having built and deployed robust, complex production systems that implement modern, data scientific methods at scale
  • Comfort in environments where large projects are time-boxed, and therefore consequential design decisions may need to be made and acted upon rapidly
  • Demonstrated fluency in modern programming languages for data science, covering a wide gamut from data storage and engineering frameworks through machine learning libraries.
  • Knowledge of one or more machine learning frameworks, including but not limited to: Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, Keras/Theano, Torch, Caffe, MxNet, etc.
  • Familiarity with the architecture, performance characteristics, and limitations of modern storage and computational frameworks.
  • A history of compelling side projects or contributions to the Open-Source community is valued but not required
  • Solid theoretical grounding in the mathematical core of the major ideas in data science and applied understanding of a class of modeling or analytical technique
  • Fluency in the mathematical principles and generalisations of data science - e. g., Statistics, Linear Algebra, and Vector Calculus
  • Experience presenting at high-impact data science conferences and solid connections to the data science community (e. g., via meetups, continuing relationships with academics, etc. )
  • Interest/background in Prop Tech in particular.

details.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Tech Lead for our Security Operations team. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing and leading the day-to-day activities of our security operations, ensuring the protection of our organization& #39 s digital assets and data. As a Tech Lead, you will play a crucial role in enhancing our security posture and mitigating risks.


Responsibilities:

  • Lead and mentor a team of security analysts and engineers.
  • Foster a culture of continuous learning and professional development.
  • Provide guidance, support, and technical expertise to team members.
  • Oversee the monitoring, detection, and response to security threats and incidents.
  • Coordinate incident response activities, including containment, eradication, and recovery.
  • Ensure the security operations team operates 24/7 responding to incidents promptly.
  • Evaluate, implement, and manage security tools and technologies to enhance our security posture.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest security trends and technologies to recommend improvements.
  • Develop and enforce security policies, standards, and procedures.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure security policies align with business goals.
  • Conduct security audits and assessments to identify vulnerabilities and weaknesses.
  • Ensure compliance with industry regulations and standards (e. g., ISO 27001 NIST).
  • Promote security awareness and best practices throughout the organization.
  • Conduct training sessions and workshops for employees on security-related topics.
  • Incident Reporting and Documentation:
  • Maintain detailed records of security incidents, investigations, and resolutions.
  • Prepare and present incident reports to senior management and stakeholders.


Requirements:

  • Cyber security Expertise: In-depth knowledge of cyber security principles, threats, and best practices. A strong understanding of security frameworks (e. g., NIST, ISO 27001) is essential.
  • Leadership and Communication: Strong leadership skills to manage security teams, collaborate with other departments, and effectively communicate security issues to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Incident Response: Proficiency in incident detection, analysis, and response. The ability to lead incident response teams during security breaches or incidents is crucial.
  • Security Information and Event Management (SIEM): Experience with SIEM solutions (e. g., WAZUH, Splunk, ELK Stack) for real-time monitoring and analysis of security events and logs.
  • Security Monitoring: Strong skills in setting up and managing security monitoring tools, intrusion detection systems (IDS/IPS), and log analysis for threat detection.
  • Network Security: Proficiency in network security principles, firewall management, VPN technologies, and network segmentation.
  • Cloud Security: Understanding of cloud security best practices and experience securing cloud environments (e. g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Security Policies and Procedures: Development and enforcement of security policies, procedures, and guidelines in alignment with industry standards and compliance requirements.
  • Security Awareness: The ability to promote security awareness and conduct training sessions for staff to improve security hygiene across the organization.
  • Security Risk Assessment: Conducting risk assessments and vulnerability assessments to identify and prioritize security risks and vulnerabilities
  • Compliance and Regulations: Knowledge of regulatory compliance requirements (e. g., GDPR, HIPAA) and experience ensuring compliance within the organization.
  • Project Management: Ability to lead security projects, coordinate resources, and ensure project deadlines are met.
  • Secure Development Knowledge: Familiarity with secure software development practices, code reviews for security, and integration of security into the software development lifecycle.
  • Security Certifications: Relevant certifications like Certified Information Systems
  • Security Professional (CISSP), Certified Information Security Manager (CISM), or
  • Certified Information Security Manager (CISA) are often required or highly beneficial.
  • Cloud Security Certification: Certifications specific to cloud security (e. g., AWS
  • Certified Security - Specialty, Azure Security Engineer) can be advantageous.
  • Penetration Testing: Experience with penetration testing and ethical hacking to identify and remediate vulnerabilities.
  • Encryption Technologies: Knowledge of encryption technologies and their application in securing data at rest and in transit.
  • Third-Party Risk Management: Experience in evaluating and managing the security risks associated with third-party vendors and partners.
  • Security Architecture: Understanding of security architecture design principles and the ability to assess and enhance an organization& #39 s security architecture.
  • Bachelor& #39 s or Master& #39 s degree in Information Security, Computer Science, or related field.
  • Proven experience in a security operations role, with at least 5 Years of leadership experience.
  • Industry certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or CISA are highly desirable.
  • In-depth knowledge of security technologies, including SIEM, IDS/IPS, firewalls, and endpoint security.
  • Strong understanding of security frameworks and standards (e. g., NIST, ISO 27001).
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Ability to work effectively under pressure and in high-stress situations.
details.title: Tech Lead - Security Ops

details.description:
As a senior Java Engineer at Tide you will be working on new and existing projects for our Payments area. We have a long roadmap ahead of us, with exciting new features and you'll be solving interesting problems while collaborating with the rest of the Tide team to achieve our mission to save small and medium businesses time and money. With our expanding business, we will encourage you to outgrow your initial responsibilities, if you so desire. This role offers an exceptional opportunity to make a real difference by taking ownership of engineering practices in a rapidly expanding company! Technology and our people are what make Tide possible. We work in autonomous teams, self-organise, discuss technical challenges, and set our own guidelines in the different Community of Practices.

On the backend we see Java 8 as legacy and use Java 11+ for our micro-services. We provide RESTful APIs to our colleagues in the frontend. Spring Boot is our work horse, but we are open to new experiments. We are cloud-native and run everything on AWS. You'll see containers (Docker), queues (SNS+SQS, Kafka) and events everywhere. The nature of our business naturally fits with relational databases, but we have also found some use cases for NoSQL. Our frontends have done an incredible job at consuming our APIs and providing the best UX to our members. They are native Android and iOS apps or Angular 2+ web apps. The Cloud Engineering team provides us with vital infrastructure and DevOps support on the cloud.


Responsibilities:

  • Working on early engineering phases to lay the groundwork for your team(s) in the Payments area.
  • Leading backend engineers across multiple agile teams splitting your time between design, coding and coaching other team members. You will be the person people turn to seeking advice and solutions to difficult problems.
  • Joining one or more multidisciplinary agile teams, you will be required to work closely with product owners, mobile engineers, and other business members to translate requirements into well-engineered solutions.
  • Making key contributions to our backend community of practices. Your input on how to improve processes and maintain a high quality across the backend will be very welcomed. Career progression is as important to us as it is for you!


Requirements:

  • Have extensive experience (4+ years) building server-side applications and detailed knowledge of the relevant programming languages for your stack (i. e Java 8 or newer).
  • Have a sound knowledge of a Java backend framework (e. g. Spring/Spring Boot).
  • Have experience with microservices and implementing and consuming RESTful APIs.
  • Have experience engineering scalable and reliable solutions.
  • Demonstrate a mindset of delivering secure, well-tested and well-documented software.
  • Are willing to own your code and your team's processes from development to production.
  • Have exposure to complex solutions in payments-related industries.
  • Have experience integrating to third parties.
  • Experience with relational databases.
  • Have experience with relational databases.
  • Are comfortable working in agile methodologies, ideally Scrum.
  • Have the ability to communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience.
  • Have exposure to continuous integration, delivery and deployment.
details.title: Senior Java Engineer

details.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Establish the strategic direction and vision for High Level's SMS/Call/WhatsApp product features.
  • Make informed decisions about product roadmaps based on market trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and prioritise user requirements and feature enhancements.
  • Collaborate with customers to identify their needs and current challenges, which would feed forward into the Product planning process.
  • Develop and maintain a detailed product roadmap for workflow automation, aligning it with the company's overall product strategy and goals.
  • Conduct user research, interviews, and data analysis to gather insights and identify pain points.
  • Translate user needs into clear and actionable product requirements, user stories, and acceptance criteria.
  • Collaborate with engineering and design teams to ensure timely and high-quality product delivery.
  • Plan and execute product launches, including creating go-to-market strategies, coordinating marketing efforts, and driving user adoption and engagement of workflow automation features.
  • Communicate product plans, progress, and updates to internal teams and stakeholders, including executives.
  • Act as a subject matter expert on workflow automation, providing guidance and support to internal teams and external customers.
  • Define and track key product metrics to evaluate product performance and drive data-driven decision-making.
  • Monitor customer feedback and conduct a competitive analysis to identify areas for improvement and address customer pain points.


Requirements:

  • Domain Knowledge: Strong understanding of VOIP, Messaging and WhatsApp integrations and automation concepts, technologies, integration frameworks and market trends.
  • Technical background: Ability to comprehend technical specifications, APIs, and integration frameworks. Comfort working with developers and understanding their requirements and constraints.
  • Analytical Skills: Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to use data and metrics to drive product decisions and measure product success.
  • Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Leadership and Collaboration: Strong leadership skills to drive the product vision, influence cross-functional teams, and work collaboratively in a fast-paced, agile environment.
  • User-Centric Mindset: Deep empathy for users and a strong passion for delivering exceptional user experiences.
  • Business Acumen: Understanding business models, market dynamics, and competitive landscape. Ability to align product decisions with business goals and drive product success.
  • Minimum 2+ years as a Product Manager, preferably in SaaS, with expertise in communication platforms or related fields.
  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, business, or a related discipline.
  • Experience in building integrations for communication platforms (e. g., Twilio, Meta, Plivo, Bandwidth, Ring Central, etc) and familiarity with VOIP and messaging technologies.

details.description:
We are looking for an experienced and professional recruiter to help support our departments in increasing their teams with qualified A-players. Success in this role requires organizational and interpersonal skills. A qualified candidate can manage the hiring of 7-10 different roles simultaneously, manage communication with the internal hiring managers and candidates, organize feedback on candidates, and be able to assist in needed pivots to ensure we extend offers to the best candidates.


Responsibilities:

  • Recruit for open positions & identify appropriate recruiting sources
  • Regularly communicate with all teams actively recruiting
  • Route resumes to points of contact and solicit feedback
  • Screen applicants via telephone or video
  • Determine the most qualified candidates and make recommendations
  • Use behavioral interviewing techniques to determine organizational fit as well as appropriate experience
  • Work with the hiring manager and candidates throughout the recruiting process, keeping both up-to-date on status regularly
  • Use our ATS software to track applicants and run candidate reports to keep the People team and CEO up to date on the candidate pool
  • Comply with all legal and professional standards during the recruitment process


Requirements:

  • 2-4 years experience in recruitment at a rapidly growing company, preferably a tech company
  • Strong interpersonal skills
  • Ability to communicate in a fact-based, articulate, compelling manner
  • Demonstrates a high degree of integrity and maintains confidentiality
  • Demonstrates understanding of the business, industry, customers, and business processes
  • Strong interviewing skills include: probing beyond what people say to assess real qualifications, active listening, thorough understanding, and application of behavioral interviewing
  • Ability to find candidates and follow through all the way to signed contracts- ability to close
  • Proficient at bringing recruitment offers to successful closure

details.description:

Ultimately, a top-class Python developer is able to design highly responsive web applications that perfectly meet the requirements.

  • Coordinating with development teams to determine application requirements.
  • Writing scalable code using Python programming language.
  • Testing and debugging applications.
  • Developing back-end components.
  • Integrating user-facing elements using server-side logic.
  • Assessing and prioritizing client feature requests.
  • Integrating data storage solutions.
  • Coordinating with front-end developers.
  • Reprogramming existing databases to improve functionality.
  • Developing digital tools to monitor online traffic.

title: QA Manual Test Engineer - Front End & Backend

employer.company_tagline: Personalized cancer treatment plans in 24 hours
employer.instahyre_note: Navya empowers cancer patients, caregivers, and physicians with personalized treatment plans based on clinical evidence and real-time expertise of Tata Memorial Centre and National Cancer Grid.

details.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Able to do Manual Testing as per the company standards.
  • Able to do Functional testing of applications (smoke and regression testing).
  • Create test plans from the user stories defined by product owners.
  • Review test plans and cases with devs and product owners.
  • Integrate the tests into CI (Continuous Integration) builds.
  • Provide clear bug descriptions and useful debugging information, ideally for a complex system containing several moving parts.
  • Create simulation data for testing.
  • Maintain a proper test environment.
  • Provide sign-off on applications ready to enter the UAT and PROD stage.
  • To Mentor junior testers in the team.
  • Be responsible for certifying each build that goes out to production.
  • Make sure the manual test coverage is as high as possible, and fill in the gaps with documented manual testing.


Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience in Manual Tests of UI & API.
  • Worked on different projects. Not just one large project for many years with large organizations, repeatedly doing the same work.
  • Ability to create test plans from user stories.
  • Good communication and documentation skills.
  • Understanding of complete SDLC.
  • Experience in selenium. Protractor/Appium is a plus.
  • Experience with load simulation tools like Jmeter, artillery.io, etc.
  • Knowledge of API testing tools like the Postman.
  • Good understanding of HTTP protocol, REST API, Cookies, and browser sessions.
  • Experience with Test planning management tools (e. g. zephyr), and bug/issue tracking tools (e. g. Jira, GitLab).
  • Knowledge of VCS like GIT/SVN will be needed.
  • Has worked on multiple products parallelly.
  • MySQL/Oracle knowledge will be a plus.
  • Should have the skill to approach problem statements programmatically.
  • A good understanding of Unix/Linux OS will be preferred
  • Knowledge of pytest/playwright and other BDD frameworks will be preferred
  • Experienced in AI-powered tools for test automation or manual testing will be a plus.

You'll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, leveraging SAFe practices to ensure effective communication, collaboration, and delivery of value to our customers.

  • Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent certification.
  • Proven experience (X years) working as a Scrum Master in an Agile environment.
  • Strong understanding and practical application of the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe).
  • Ability to coach teams on Agile principles, practices, and ceremonies.
  • Excellent communication, facilitation, and conflict-resolution skills.
  • Experience in leading Agile transformations or implementing SAFe is a plus.
  • Collaborative and adaptable mindset with a passion for continuous improvement.

employer.company_tagline: Online Share/Stock Trading, Options Trading, Discount Brokers In India
employer.instahyre_note: Upstox is a Financial Services company that offers fintech solutions to customers wrt discount stock broking, with easy-to-use trading platforms. It was founded as RKSV Securities.

details.description:
We are looking for a Manual cum Automation Development Engineer. The successful candidate will help in creating frontend test scripts and run in a batch daily to verify the assigned Upstox product / Module end to end. Candidates also need to analyze automation test results and share across. The framework is based on Python and PyTest. This is a fast-paced environment where the speed of Development and execution are paramount. The candidate will initially have to work on manual testing tasks on a need basis, then pitch in for automation. This position needs to be very fluent in the manual testing process and take the production releases with the highest quality.


Responsibilities:

  • Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency.
  • Accurate test reporting to stakeholders and design process to improve test coverage.
  • Ensure that testability and quality are embedded throughout the software development and test life cycle.
  • Report issues as appropriate and follow up to get them to the closure.
  • Complete automation tests, troubleshoot failure scripts and conduct test reports on time.
  • Keep improving the automation test efficiency and script ability.
  • Design automated test coverage strategies based on release requirements.
  • Participate in peer reviews for test cases, design, and code implementation.


Requirements:

  • Overall 3-5 years experience.
  • Minimum 3 years of experience in the manual testing process, creating highly effective test cases using different testing techniques and expert in system, integration, and regression testing.
  • Around 2 years of experience developing automation scripts in Python or Pytest framework.
  • Experience in working in Scrum - agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, and build processes (CI/CD Pipeline).
  • Ability to troubleshoot and think out of the box.
  • Experience with Charles Proxy, Jenkins, Selenium, Android Studio/Xcode, and TestNG tools.
  • Experience with tools like Jira, Xray, Confluence
  • Experience in defining automation test strategies and designing the automation framework.
  • Ability to analyze production issues and able to simulate defects by creating required test data.
  • Good reading and written English communication skills and good team player.
  • Self-motivated, persistent, fast learner, and innovative.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Having experience with Trading and the FinTech domain is an added plus.
  • Having experience in Mobile Apps (iOS & Android), and web applications.
  • Having flexibility in switching responsibilities between Manual and Automation.
  • Having knowledge of RESTFul services

employer.company_tagline: Simplified Financial Services
employer.instahyre_note: Wells Fargo is a multinational financial services company providing banking, insurance, investments, mortgage, and consumer and commercial financial services. It is ranked 30th on Fortune's 500 list.

details.description:
Wells Fargo is seeking a Senior Lead Analytics Consultant within Customer Excellence Data and Analytics (CEDA). Our organization, Customer Excellence Data and Analytics (CEDA), sits within Enterprise Complaints and Remediations (ECR) and focuses on being Wells Fargo's leading data and analytics organization in solving business problems, finding actionable insights, proactively mitigating risk, and enabling operational excellence. CEDA supports the Wells Fargo enterprise with business enablement and analytics that solve problems, drive efficiency, and sustain a strong risk and control environment. We use our expansive knowledge of data to operationalize analytic solutions.


Within CEDA, this role will be a part of Controls, Governance, and Operational Reporting. The scope of the role includes research, compiling, and reporting- work unit and individual volume, productivity, quality, and other statistics. Provide reporting using database query spreadsheets. Perform routine administrative, system-related, and customer support tasks. Coordinate, monitor, and generate daily production of reports used in analytics. Receive direction from the manager and escalate questions and issues to more experienced individuals. Interact with team, peers, and manager on policies and procedures.


Responsibilities:

As part of a team focused on preserving the customer experience across the organization, this role will be responsible for:

  • Demonstrate experience in Analytics and Reporting, Financial Modeling, Statistics, or equivalent demonstrated through one or a combination of the following: work experience, training, military experience, and education.
  • Perform and test highly complex data analytics for customer remediations.
  • Provide end-to-end ownership of analytics projects including requirements development, code development, testing, peer review, and data-driven guidance/recommendations for remediation strategies.
  • Design analysis projects flow and documentation that is structured for consistency, easy to understand, and to be offered to multiple levels of reviewers, partners, and regulatory agents demonstrating research and analysis completed.
  • Investigate and ensure data integrity from multiple sources. Ensure data recommended and used is the best source of truth.
  • Employ creative and innovative thinking in establishing solutions to operational and data problems or inefficiencies. Identify appropriate design and technology strategies to address problems and create new capabilities, using existing technology solutions where possible.
  • Design and implement efficient and repeatable solutions that fit within a defined and well-governed framework. Participate in determining performance metrics for the solution.
  • Apply knowledge of business, customers, and products to synthesize data to 'form a story' and align information to contrast/compare to industry perspective. Data involved is typically very large, structured or unstructured, and from multiple sources.
  • Provide end-to-end project ownership, including partnering with peers and partners to create requirements, establishing a consensus-aligned design strategy, developing and documenting technical requirements, building the solution, and participating in testing, including but not limited to peer reviews, security peer reviews, internal testing, and user acceptance testing.
  • Must have strong attention to detail and be able to meet high-quality standards consistently.
  • Willing to assist with high-priority work outside of regular business hours or on weekend as needed.


Requirements:

  • Around 10+ years in analytics role
  • Bachelors, M. A. /M. Sc. College Degree or Higher in applied mathematics, statistics, engineering, physics, accounting, finance, economics, econometrics, computer sciences, or business/social and behavioral sciences with a quantitative emphasis.
  • Advanced SQL/SAS skill set.
  • Strong in data mining and data analysis.
  • Strong and advanced experience in Tableau visualization. Proficient with creation of interactive dashboards using Tableau Desktop and server.
  • Good knowledge in Tableau prep. Proficient in data preparation which needs exploration, cleaning, and shaping data in real-time before analysis.
  • Draw insights on analyzed data and present the same in PowerPoint, Tableau or any other equivalent reporting tool in a visually appealing manner.
  • Advanced experience with operational metric reporting.
  • Ability to be proactive, innovative and creative in meeting customer and enterprise needs.
  • Advanced experience with contact center operations data including telephony and digital channels.
  • Advanced Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook and PowerPoint) skills.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy skills.
  • Ability to influence and collaborate at all internal organizational levels.
  • Proven experience with conducting risk and process assessments.
  • Ability to translate and present complex data in a manner that educates, enhances understanding, and influence decisions.
  • Ability to be flexible and adjust plans quickly to meet changing business needs.
  • Ability to track and monitor project progress, identify project and process gaps, recommend controls and communicate progress to business leaders.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, including those related to conflict resolution.
  • Strong Analytical background.
  • Experience partnering with Senior Leaders and Executives.
  • Ability to quickly learn business operations and processes.
  • Strong experience with data integration, database structures and data warehouses.
  • Persuasive written and verbal communication skills.


Desired Qualifications:

  • Extensive knowledge and understanding of research and analysis.
  • Strong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracy.
  • Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills.
  • 8+ years of Tableau or any other equivalent reporting tool experience.
  • 8+ year of SAS server and SQL experience.
  • Good to have ThoughtSpot/PowerBI/maybe Alteryx.
  • Good to know VBA, UNIX.
  • Knowledge about Home Lending or Auto Lending is a plus.
  • Knowledge of PVSI, Non-Lending, Student Loans, Small Business and Personal Lines and Loans is a plus.
  • Strong communication skills and ability to articulate complex material to a diverse audience.
  • Ability to grasp complex business issues quickly, recommend solutions, and drive for resolutions.
  • Ability to form a story through data analysis.
  • Ability to effectively assess stakeholder, partner, or client needs while consulting, building solutions, and developing processes.
  • Ability to translate business needs into complex analysis designs and recommendations. Uses analysis to identify and define business requirements, while supporting the validity of the final product.
  • Experience coordinating multiple tasks within aggressive time frames.
  • Ability to prioritize work, meet deadlines, achieve goals, and work under pressure in a dynamic and complex environment.
  • Ability to articulate basic project methodology concepts for managing scope, cost, and schedule.
  • Ability to take initiative, identify opportunities and implement change.
  • Ability to interact with integrity and a high level of professionalism with all levels of team members and management.
  • Ability to lead during times of ambiguity and change.
  • Ability to work effectively in a team environment and across all organizational levels, where flexibility, collaboration, and adaptability are important.

employer.company_tagline: Indias first socially distributed full stack financial services platform for sm
employer.instahyre_note: WeRize is the Indian fintech platform and a full-stack financial services provider that manufactures and distributes a wide portfolio of customized credit, insurance, and savings products for its customers.

details.description:
This is a critical role in the company. The incumbent in the role will be responsible for leading and enhancing the relationships with the Banks, NBFCs, Fintech, and other ecosystem players ensuring capital supply for business growth.


Responsibilities:

  • Building New Partnerships:
  • Build a deep understanding of WeRize's value proposition and how it adds value to Lenders.
  • Liaison with product, credit, operations, and technology teams to on-board new relationships.
  • Problem-solving for blockers in onboarding a new partner.
  • Grow Existing Partnerships:
  • Coordinate ongoing day-to-day relationships with lenders to ensure the smooth running of partnerships.
  • Act as a single point of contact for all internal and lender-side escalations.
  • Track the ongoing issues and engage with internal and lenders' teams for timely resolution.
  • Engage with lenders to lead new policy and product initiatives.
  • Debt Raise:
  • Pitch to Banks, NBFCs, and other financial institutions for raising debt for in-house NBFCs.
  • Prepare and share relevant information and data with existing and potential lenders.
  • Ensure timely sharing of information with lenders.
  • Engage with relevant internal and lender teams to address queries from lenders.
  • Manage day-to-day relationships with lenders and resolve ongoing issues.


Requirements:

  • 2 - 4 years of experience in Debt Raise/FinTech tie-up/Co-lending role at a leading FinTech or NBFC.
  • Experience in coordinating with product, credit, and operations teams to resolve operational issues.
  • CA or MBA from top tier institute.
  • Should be strong in relationship building, service orientation, follow-ups, and closure.
  • Good at problem-solving and project management.
  • Excellent analytical skills, motivated, hardworking, and self-driven leader.
  • The ability to interact with stakeholders internal and external is essential.
details.title: Manager - Capital Markets & Industry Partnerships

details.description:
Wells Fargo is seeking a Senior Lead Analytics Consultant within Customer Excellence Data and Analytics (CEDA). Our organization, Customer Excellence Data and Analytics (CEDA), sits within Enterprise Complaints and Remediations (ECR) and focuses on being Wells Fargo's leading data and analytics organization in solving business problems, finding actionable insights, proactively mitigating risk, and enabling operational excellence. CEDA supports the Wells Fargo enterprise with business enablement and analytics that solve problems, drive efficiency and sustain a strong risk and control environment. We use our expansive knowledge of data to operationalize analytic solutions.


Within CEDA, this role will be a part of Controls, Governance, and Operational Reporting. The scope of the role includes research, compiling, and reporting- work unit and individual volume, productivity, quality, and other statistics. Provide reporting using database query spreadsheets. Perform routine administrative, system-related, and customer support tasks. Coordinate, monitor, and generate daily production of reports used in analytics. Receive direction from the manager and escalate questions and issues to more experienced individuals. Interact with team, peers, and manager on policies and procedures.


Responsibilities:

As part of a team focused on preserving the customer experience across the organization, this role will be responsible for:

  • Demonstrate experience in Analytics and Reporting, Financial Modeling, Statistics, or equivalent demonstrated through one or a combination of the following: work experience, training, military experience, and education.
  • Perform and test highly complex data analytics for customer remediations.
  • Provide end-to-end ownership of analytics projects including requirements development, code development, testing, peer review, and data-driven guidance/recommendations for remediation strategies.
  • Design analysis projects flow and documentation that is structured for consistency, easy to understand, and to be offered to multiple levels of reviewers, partners, and regulatory agents demonstrating research and analysis completed.
  • Investigate and ensure data integrity from multiple sources. Ensure data recommended and used is the best source of truth.
  • Employ creative and innovative thinking in establishing solutions to operational and data problems or inefficiencies. Identify appropriate design and technology strategies to address problems and create new capabilities, using existing technology solutions where possible.
  • Design and implement efficient and repeatable solutions that fit within a defined and well-governed framework. Participate in determining performance metrics for the solution.
  • Apply knowledge of business, customers, and products to synthesize data to 'form a story' and align information to contrast/compare to industry perspective. Data involved is typically very large, structured or unstructured, and from multiple sources.
  • Provide end to end project ownership, including partnering with peers and partners to create requirements, establishing a consensus-aligned design strategy, developing and documenting technical requirements, building the solution, and participating in testing, including but not limited to peer reviews, security peer reviews, internal testing, and user acceptance testing.
  • Must have strong attention to detail and be able to meet high quality standards consistently.

Requirements:

  • Around 10+ years in analytics role

  • Strong in data mining and data analysis.

  • Persuasive written and verbal communication skills.


Desired Qualifications:

  • Extensive knowledge and understanding of research and analysis.
  • Strong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracy.

details.description:
The Manage - Loyalty, NPD & Partnerships will report to the Head - Loyalty & Partnerships, within the Marketing (Commercial) function of the airline, to develop and implement the airline's strategy of driving repeat purchase and engagement from bookers and flyers; and the associated loyalty program and partnerships. The role will be responsible for planning and executing campaigns to meet the associated commercial and customer objectives. The Manager - Loyalty & Partnerships is a senior resource in the Commercial team and would be expected to drive the loyalty program and its integration in all aspects, encompassing all online, pre-purchase, booking, post-purchase and journey touchpoints, as well as post flight engagement and repeat purchase with actionable insights from performance reports, and implementing best practices for a globally bench-marked airline program.


Responsibilities:

  • Manage the Loyalty Program - Structure, Benefits and Processes including P& L responsibility and managing comms planning & execution for loyalty acquisition, retention and share of wallet
  • Grow salience, and consideration for the airline loyalty program and tiers
  • Drive acquisition (penetration, conversion, and new to AIX), frequency of flying, share of wallet, & revenue on indirect and owned channels
  • Grow partnership acquisition & traction, eg AirBNB, AirFlix, Tata Digital, Shop Share Smile, Bank and Network (MasterCard, Visa, American Express) Partners, etc
  • Increase channel contribution - Drive app downloads and sessions, engagement, transactions & revenue for logged in users on app & web
  • Develop a distinct positioning for the loyalty program and tiers, defined by the commercial strategy on key differentiating planks
  • Develop the operating standards for loyalty and customer journey for each tier, working with operational departments including Customer Happiness, Learning & Development, Flight Operations & Ground Operations
  • Differentiate the program Define, refine and ensure delivery of moments of truth to stand apart from others in the airline category and appeal of tiers within the program
  • Drive new design thinking and innovation in loyalty with a commercial focus
  • Plan, design, and oversee implementation of an overarching brand loyalty strategy to increase customer engagement, retention, engagement, NPS and sales
  • Develop the customer experience and communication strategy for all partnerships in coordination with rationalisation, Marketing and Brand teams to deliver best-in-class marketing campaigns and communications across multiple marketing channels
  • Perform in-depth target audience research and execute data-driven customer segmentation to ensure our loyalty journeys are customised and personalised for each member
  • Continuously evaluate the structure and features of partner agreements, negotiate and implement any necessary changes based on rigorous quantitative and qualitative analysis
  • Identify new strategic financial and non-financial partners that fit with the brand and are aligned with commercial strategy. Negotiates terms of and executes partnership contracts, and then oversees technical integration with AirAsia and Tata Digital Systems.
  • Develop partner marketing strategies and manages the partner marketing calendar to drive member awareness and utilisation of partners
  • Responsible for obtaining buy-in from and influencing senior management and stakeholders for specific key initiatives, commitments, changes including requirements, budget, schedule, scope, risk mitigation and contingency plans.
  • Function / Domain -Marketing (Commercial)

details.description:
AMC is seeking a Sr Support Engineer to provide support to partners and external customers as they build business-critical applications on our platform. You'll also work directly with Amazon Advertising product and engineering teams to ensure that customer issues are resolved as expediently as possible. In this role, you will independently resolve customer issues and blockers by providing knowledgeable and responsive technical support on AMC. Our customers are large enterprises, direct and agencies. You would often interact with customers' Data Analysts and other Data focused stakeholders. You would use advanced SQL skills to build confidence and solutions.


You will have ownership for issue investigation, identifying root cause and software defects, conceive and provide workarounds if acceptable to customers for continuity. You will gather sufficient information that helps reproduce issues and contribute to building software fixes. This is a complex, and fast-paced environment as you will own the most critical part of the customer experience and delivering on our customers' most basic need. While we obsess over issue resolution, in this role you will also develop tools to scale our support & service quality, and provide critical input for product prioritization to address root causes of why the customer experienced an issue in the first place. Our advertising customers are likely Amazon customers, and we take seriously maintaining the high customer service bar set by Amazon to be the level at which we need to operate.


Responsibilities:

  • Track, investigate, and resolve customer questions and issues using appropriate communication channel including phone, email, and live as well as asynchronous at various levels of complexity and customer impact.
  • Act as an escalation point for the most complex and in-depth issues that potentially span multiple external and internal organisations.
  • Communicate directly with internal organisations to complete root cause analyses, issue investigation, workarounds and defect resolution.
  • Develop and implement complex repro cases to identify potential software defects, mis-configurations, or issues in customer environments.
  • Use case management tools to manage and prioritise issues based on multiple factors including customer impact.
  • Build & Contribute to training material and documentation for both internal and customer-facing users.
  • Actively seeking solutions to customer needs, communicating trends to leadership, and suggesting innovative solutions on behalf of the customer experience.
  • Providing support directly to data analysts who are using Amazon Marketing Cloud.
  • Writing queries, code samples, tutorials, and technical articles for the customer community
  • Working with customers to understand how they are using our services, and providing feedback to development teams
  • Collaborating with internal stakeholders to drive timely customer communication
  • Driving internal projects that improve support-related processes and our customer's user experience

We collaborate across the organization to identify, develop, and deliver Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) powered software solutions. On any given day, our team could be working on building sophisticated models to deliver personalised recommendations to patients to improve their sleep, identify optimal equipment and settings using our unparalleled store of billion+ nights of sleep data, proactively identify other health risk factors, or help optimize complex, global supply chain operations.


Responsibilities:

  • Build and maintain systems built using DevOps, AWS, Python, and Terraform.
  • Stay informed of industry trends and enable successful DevOps AWS platform and Terraform solutions by leveraging best practices.
  • Participate in and set up Proof of Concepts (POCs) to demonstrate proposed solutions.
  • Enable team members through training, culture, and team building.
  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: Automating manual processes, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.
  • Build infrastructure needed for the AWS platform, such as Lambdas, EC2 Docker, pipeline engineering, data monitoring alerting, and networking.
  • Build, Design, Implement and support Data & ML model pipelines using the latest CICD and deployment technologies.
  • Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to help with technical issues and support their infrastructure needs.
  • Actively handle escalated incidents to resolution and suggest solutions to limit future exposure.
  • Participate in Code Review and process improvement.


Requirements:

  • 4+ years of total experience in a complex, technical environment.
  • Experience with developing production-grade code in SQL, Pandas, Java & Python.
  • Experience with 3 or more of the following AWS tools: Lambda, EC2 EMR, S3 Glue, Athena, RDS, Networking, IAM, Batch processing, Sagemaker, MWAA
  • Experience or self-study in Terraform and, generally commonly used DevOps tools and techniques like Bitbucket, Github, Code pipeline & Jenkins.
  • Experience in creating and working with CICD pipelines and APIs.
  • Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases.
  • Experience working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.

details.description:
This role presents a unique opportunity to shape the future of AI and the value it can unlock across every aspect of an organisation's business and operations. It is a high-visibility position that will shape the future of the AI platform by delivering best-in-class cost-performance software solutions. SambaNova is hiring a Principal Platform Software Engineer to lead the technical evolution of the developer experience as we scale to a global SaaS provider.


Responsibilities:

  • Build cutting-edge customised tooling solutions to run complex workloads at scale across hybrid cloud environments to enhance software development, testing, and deployment efficiency
  • Profile components of these workloads to identify bottlenecks and inefficiencies and develop solutions to improve overall time and resource utilisation
  • Drive the adoption of cutting-edge public cloud technologies across hybrid cloud environments to accelerate overall developer velocity
  • Develop robust and scalable systems for building and managing software artifacts like Linux packages, container images and Python wheels
  • Oversee the maintenance of leading continuous integration systems and ensure seamless integration with other systems and tools for optimal performance
  • Design and implement streamlined industry-standard practices and policies for DevOps, GitOps and MLOps across various teams and functions.
  • Work closely with stakeholders to assess and implement enterprise-level systems that align with the organisation's goals and objectives


Requirements:

  • 8+ years in software engineering, technology architecture, and DevOps with a demonstrated ability to design, implement, and maintain secure, scalable, and resilient systems to support software development and deployment
  • Strong computer science fundamentals
  • Extensive experience building enterprise-grade software with Python, Go, or other modern programming languages
  • Deep knowledge of distributed systems and cloud platform concepts
  • Solid understanding of fundamental CI/CD, GitOps, and DevOps concepts and experience with building pipelines using technologies such as Jenkins and CircleCI
  • Strong understanding of Linux operating system concepts and proficiency with Python or Bash scripting
  • Strong understanding of containers and familiarity with container orchestration in cloud environments
  • Strong technical acumen with Kubernetes and hands on experience with deploying and managing services on clusters using tools like Helm and ArgoCD
  • Deep understanding of provisioning infrastructure in a hybrid-cloud environment, infrastructure-as-code (IaC) principles, and familiarity with relevant technologies such as Ansible and Terraform
  • Experience building and deploying robust and secure web APIs and microservices
  • Proven ability to lead technical teams and mentor junior members
  • Proven startup experience in scaling and supporting engineering teams, with the ability to lead by example and foster a high-performance culture
  • Experience with using tools like Argo Workflows and Kubernetes as a job scheduler at scale
  • Familiarity with container runtimes and container image build nuances

  • Proficient in cloud computing technologies and have experience working with Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, or Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
  • Experience working in a high-growth startup
  • A team player who demonstrates humility
  • Action-oriented with a focus on speed and results
  • Ability to thrive in a no-boundaries culture and make an impact on innovation

details.description:
You'll be working with varied and diverse teams to deliver unique and unprecedented solutions across industries. As a Data Scientist, you will be primarily responsible for managing technical projects and helping teams design analytics (or modeling) pipelines that consistently drive solutions to be extensible and produce quality. You are an expert in selected domains and can contrast methods and select appropriate approaches based on the data or analytics problem at hand.


Responsibilities:

  • Exploring data and crafting models to answer core business problems
  • Explaining, refining, and crafting model insights and architecture to bring stakeholders through the journey of model building
  • Keeping up with your domain's state of the art & developing familiarity with emerging modeling and data engineering methodologies
  • Advocating application of best practices in modeling, code hygiene, and data engineering
  • Led the development of proprietary statistical techniques, algorithms, or analytical tools on projects and asset development


Requirements:

  • You are a well-rounded technologist who brings a wealth of real-world experience and:
  • Technical background in computer science, data science, machine learning, artificial intelligence, statistics, or other quantitative and computational science
  • Compelling track record of designing and deploying large-scale technical solutions, which deliver tangible, ongoing value including direct experience having built and deployed robust, complex production systems that implement modern, data scientific methods at scale
  • Comfort in environments where large projects are time-boxed, and therefore consequential design decisions may need to be made and acted upon rapidly
  • Demonstrated fluency in modern programming languages for data science, covering a wide gamut from data storage and engineering frameworks through machine learning libraries.
  • Knowledge of one or more machine learning frameworks, including but not limited to: Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, Keras/Theano, Torch, Caffe, MxNet, etc.
  • Familiarity with the architecture, performance characteristics, and limitations of modern storage and computational frameworks.
  • A history of compelling side projects or contributions to the Open-Source community is valued but not required
  • Solid theoretical grounding in the mathematical core of the major ideas in data science and applied understanding of a class of modeling or analytical technique
  • Fluency in the mathematical principles and generalisations of data science - e. g., Statistics, Linear Algebra, and Vector Calculus
  • Experience presenting at high-impact data science conferences and solid connections to the data science community (e. g., via meetups, continuing relationships with academics, etc. )
  • Interest/background in Prop Tech in particular

  • Test Case Design and Execution: Create detailed test cases and test scenarios based on project requirements. Execute test cases, record results, and track defects in a systematic manner. Perform both manual and automated testing as necessary.
  • Test Automation: Lead efforts to automate test cases using Java and SQL-based testing frameworks and tools. Maintain and enhance test automation scripts for regression testing.
  • Defect Management: Identify, report, and track defects, working closely with developers to ensure timely resolution. Conduct root cause analysis for defects and provide feedback to the development team.
  • Test Environment Setup: Configure test environments that mirror production setups. Ensure data integrity in test databases for SQL-related testing.
  • Quality Assurance Processes: Define and enforce quality assurance processes and best practices. Continuously improve testing methodologies and approaches.
  • Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams including developers, product managers, and business analysts to ensure effective communication and alignment. Participate in requirements and design reviews to provide QA input.
  • Mentoring and Training: Mentor junior QA team members and provide guidance on best practices. Conduct training sessions to enhance the QA team's technical skills.

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • 8-10 years of experience in Software Testing.
  • Proven experience as a QA Lead in Java and SQL-related projects.
  • Strong proficiency SQL querying, Stored Procedure, API testing, System/platform testing.
  • Experience in coding (Java) for writing automation test cases
  • Knowledge of software development methodologies (Agile, Scrum).

  • MySQL
  • Aerospike
  • Couchbase

  • Cassandra
  • ScyllaDB
  • MongoDB
  • RocksDB
  • PostgreSQL

details.description:
You will be joining the Data Science team in this critical role of data management, quality assurance, and analytics. You will work on a data-heavy product that offers our customers end-to-end visibility of their cargo at each step of the ocean movement. Our prediction engine answers when, where, why, and by how many days the container would be delayed. You will ensure that the data ingested in the model and shared with the customers is error-free and of the highest quality. You will own internal performance dashboards and automation processes.


The right candidate would have experience in data analysis or data analyst roles, preferably in a startup environment, and possess a high level of ownership, efficiency, and a data-driven mindset. You will be analytical, comfortable with a fast-moving organization, and eager to collaborate with different teams to drive impact across the organization.


Responsibilities:

  • Documentation, Reporting, Root Cause analysis of Prediction issues.
  • Analyze ingested and system-generated data for anomalies and gaps.
  • Refer to various data sources to plug those gaps.
  • Create data stories and come up with possible solutions in terms of QA process flow change and/or automation.
  • Own the subsequent plan and execution.
  • Automation of Performance/Accuracy review processes, report generation, data visualisation using Python, SQL.
  • Support engineering and data science teams in system-level data fixes.
  • Understand how the engine makes predictions, explore possible improvements in the process by fixing/introducing new data/features.
  • Support the customer operations, marketing team in getting insights from the data, such as performance, accuracy metrics, impact of real-time events, etc. as required.
  • Maintain, own internal and customer dashboards based on the trial/account requirements (e. g. prediction accuracy, timeliness, coverage, explain ability).


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Prior experience in data analysis or data analyst roles, preferably in a startup environment.
  • Exceptionally skilled in Python and SQL, with a demonstrated ability to consistently produce reusable and highly scalable code.
  • An eye for detail: Looking for anomalies in the system.
  • Familiarity with Linux, GitHub, product development.
  • Proven experience with data visualisation.
  • Empathy and Urgency: to feel the customer pain and react promptly on a day-to-day basis
  • A Problem solver & go-getter: either pro grammatically or manually meeting customer expectations and delivering on time.
  • Fluent with written and verbal in English.
  • Strong ownership mindset, efficiency, and data-driven approach.
  • Good to have: basic understanding of machine learning algorithms.
  • If this role sounds like you, then we would love to hear from you to discuss this great opportunity!

details.description:
The International Tax, Management Accounting and Bookkeeping Specialist will be responsible for managing the financial affairs of a multinational app-based software development and food ordering business with corporate entities in Australia, India, Sri Lanka, and plans for expansion to the UK, Canada, and the USA. This position will involve handling taxation (including international taxation), management accounting, and bookkeeping tasks for the corporate group across multiple jurisdictions.


Responsibilities:

  • Ensure timely and accurate preparation and filing of tax returns for all entities across Australia, India, Sri Lanka, and future expansions into the UK, Canada, and the USA, including income tax, GST, VAT, and other indirect taxes.
  • Manage tax compliance and reporting for the corporate group, adhering to tax residency requirements in each jurisdiction.
  • Research and stay updated on tax legislation and regulations in each operating country, ensuring the company is compliant with all relevant tax laws.
  • Assist with tax audits, inquiries, and dispute resolution processes across different jurisdictions.
  • Monitor and implement tax strategies to minimise the company's tax liabilities and risks across all operating countries.
  • Liaise with external tax advisors and consultants as needed in each jurisdiction.
  • Prepare and analyse consolidated financial statements, budgets, forecasts, and other financial reports for management decision-making, considering the financial performance of all entities across different jurisdictions.
  • Monitor and analyse the company's financial performance, identifying trends and areas for improvement across various countries.
  • Provide management with financial insights and recommendations to support strategic decision-making, taking into account the unique financial circumstances of each operating country.
  • Develop and maintain internal financial controls, policies, and procedures that comply with local regulations and accounting standards in each jurisdiction.
  • Assist with the preparation and review of financial performance metrics and KPIs across different entities and countries.
  • Record and maintain accurate financial transactions for all entities, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, and general ledger entries, considering the specific accounting requirements of each operating country.
  • Reconcile bank accounts, credit cards, and other financial accounts across different jurisdictions.
  • Ensure timely processing of invoices, payments, and receipts in each operating country.
  • Maintain accurate and up-to-date financial records in accordance with local accounting standards and principles in each jurisdiction.
  • Assist with month-end and year-end closing processes and financial reporting for each entity and country.


Requirements:

  • A bachelor's degree in accounting, finance, or a related field.
  • Must have experience with Australian entities or Australian clients.
  • Professional certifications, such as CPA or CA, are highly desirable.
  • A minimum of 3 years of experience in tax, management accounting, and bookkeeping, preferably in an international setting.
  • Strong knowledge of tax regulations in Australia, India, Sri Lanka, and familiarity with tax regulations in the UK, Canada, and the USA.
  • Familiarity with accounting standards and principles, such as IFRS, GAAP, and local accounting standards in each operating country.
  • Proficient in accounting software and technology, such as Xero, QuickBooks, or MYOB.
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
  • Strong attention to detail and a high degree of accuracy.
  • Effective communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey complex financial information to non-financial stakeholders across different jurisdictions.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team, managing multiple priorities and deadlines across various countries.
details.title: Accountant
