details.description:
We are a leading crypto-based company at the forefront of the digital revolution, empowering individuals and businesses to harness the potential of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies. As we continue to grow and expand our operations, we are seeking an experienced Finance Head to join our team in Bangalore and help drive our financial strategy and management.


As the Finance Head, you will play a crucial role in overseeing the financial operations of our company, ensuring fiscal discipline, and supporting strategic decision-making to achieve our business objectives. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in finance and accounting, with a minimum of 3 years of experience specifically within the crypto or blockchain industry.


Responsibilities:

  • Financial Strategy: Develop and implement financial strategies aligned with the company's short-term and long-term goals, considering the dynamic nature of the crypto market and its potential impact on financial planning.
  • Financial Reporting: Prepare accurate and timely financial reports, including balance sheets, profit and loss statements, cash flow statements, and other relevant financial metrics for management and stakeholders.
  • Budgeting and Forecasting:Collaborate with various departments to create budgets, monitor spending, and conduct periodic forecasting to ensure optimal resource allocation and cost-efficiency.
  • Regulatory Compliance: Stay abreast of the latest crypto-related regulations and ensure the company's financial practices are compliant with relevant laws and guidelines.
  • Financial Analysis: Analyze financial data and market trends to provide insights and recommendations for improving financial performance and identifying potential investment opportunities.
  • Risk Management:Develop and implement risk management strategies to safeguard the company's financial assets, considering the volatility associated with the Virtual Digital Asset industry.
  • Team Leadership:Manage and mentor the finance team, fostering a culture of growth, collaboration, and high-performance.
  • Investor Relations: Collaborate with the executive team to manage relationships with investors, address their financial queries, and provide them with transparent and accurate financial information.
  • Audits and Taxation: Coordinate with external auditors for financial audits and manage tax-related matters to ensure compliance with tax regulations.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in a finance-related role within a Virtual Digital Asset-based company.
  • Proven expertise in Virtual Digital Asset financial instruments, blockchain technology, and associated market dynamics.
  • Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret complex financial data.
  • Familiarity with crypto accounting practices and understanding of crypto taxation regulations.
  • Excellent leadership and team management skills.
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Detail-oriented, proactive, and able to work in a fast-paced environment.
details.title: Finance Head

Our client is looking for an ambitious Technical Product Manager who wants to work with our world class cyber security, file encryption software. The candidate should have a strong background in Technical Architecture and extensive. NET development experience. He/she will be working with project management, recruitment and strategic product development. Technologies include C# on all major platforms including Windows desktop & server, macOS, iOS and Android using NET, . NET Core and Xamarin. As a Technical Product Manager, the candidate will play a pivotal role in the development and growth of the product portfolio. He/she will bridge the gap between the technical teams and business stakeholders, ensuring that the products meet market needs, are well-architected, and achieve business goals.


Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with stakeholders to define product vision, goals, and strategy.
  • Understand market.
  • Trends and customer need to shape the product roadmap.
  • Leverage your technical architecture experience to define and oversee the system architecture of our products, ensuring scalability, performance, and maintainability.
  • Develop and maintain a product roadmap that aligns with the company's objectives and technology stack, taking into consideration the. NET ecosystem.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams to gather, prioritise, and document product requirements and use cases.
  • Act as a product owner within an Agile/Scrum environment, participating in sprint planning, backlog grooming, and ensuring the delivery of high-quality features.
  • Provide guidance to development teams with your. NET development experience, assisting in technical decision-making and problem-solving.
  • Stay updated with industry trends, competition, and customer feedback to continuously refine and enhance the product.
  • Plan and execute successful product launches, including go-to-market strategies and marketing collaboration.
  • Ensure product documentation is comprehensive and up to date for internal and external users.
  • Use data and analytics to monitor the performance of products and gather insights for improvement.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as a Technical Product Manager, preferably with prior experience as a Technical Architect.
  • Strong. NET development background, with a deep understanding of the. NET ecosystem.
  • Proficiency in Agile/Scrum methodologies and product management tools.
  • Excellent communication skills to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities with experience in the relevant industry
  • Certification in Product Management is advantageous.
  • Exceptional leadership, team collaboration and multi-project management skills.

details.description:
As a Senior Product Designer, you should have a strong understanding of user-centered design and be proficient in all aspects of the design process. You will collaborate with various stakeholders including product managers, engineers, and users to create intuitive, user-friendly designs for our cutting-edge data integration solutions. You will own and solve the most challenging problems for your teams.


Responsibilities:

  • UX Design and Execution
  • Own the User Experience (UX) design of complex workflows for technical customers, tackling projects of large scope and complexity.
  • Engage in all aspects of the design process, from research to ideation to execution.
  • Design Communication and Documentation
  • Utilize User Journey Maps, Wireframes, Interactive Prototypes, and High-Fidelity mockups to communicate design ideas and direction.
  • Document, review, and present clear and compelling design ideas to a broad range of stakeholders.
  • Project Management and Coordination
  • Prioritize design projects using agile methodologies and maintain project alignment through roadmaps, deadlines, and stakeholder reviews.
  • Collaborate with engineers and product teams to test, evaluate, and iterate on product features.
  • Design Evaluation and Iteration
  • Monitor and analyze data to evaluate the efficacy of existing interfaces, and adapt designs based on these insights.
  • Iterate on design solutions based on feedback or analytical data.
  • Design consistency and System Development
  • Create designs that adhere to and extend the existing style guide and design system.
  • Contribute to a growing design system to ensure a cohesive look, feel, and user experience across the entire Hevo Dashboard.
  • Team Collaboration and Culture Building
  • Foster a team culture of transparent collaboration.
  • Advocate for accessibility in design, encouraging product and engineering management to prioritize accessible features and bug fixes.
  • Design Expertise: Demonstrate strong design skills and proficiency in design tools.
  • User Focus: Prioritize user needs and deliver user-centric design solutions.
  • Collaboration and Communication: Work effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate design concepts clearly.
  • Leadership and Mentorship: Exhibit leadership skills and mentor junior designers.
  • Adaptability and Problem-Solving: Be adaptable, and proactive, and find creative solutions to complex design challenges.
  • Business Understanding: Understand business goals and align design decisions accordingly.
  • Continuous Learning: Stay updated with design trends and embrace a mindset of continuous learning.
  • Attention to Detail and Quality: Maintain high design standards and ensure attention to detail in every deliverable.


Requirements:

  • Strong background in UX design for enterprise products.
  • Experience in solving complex user problems through user research, interface design, creating mockups and prototypes (low and high fidelity), and documenting interaction patterns for product UI.
  • Skilled in explaining your work, process, and decisions to cross-functional stakeholders and crave feedback to produce your best work.
  • High experience in design bar and product sense demonstrated by past work or by having informed and clear views on various products in the market.
  • High proficiency in using software such as Figma, Adobe Suite, etc.
  • Experience with creating and maintaining a design system to be used across the products and other verticals.
  • Expert knowledge of current design & prototyping tools and trends.
  • Excellent communication skills to articulate your design decisions to internal stakeholders at different design stages.

Our engineering team is looking for a contractor QA Tester (4-6 months) who will be responsible for reviewing and implementing systematic test plans. In this role, you will collaborate with software developers and project support to determine project scope and requirements. To guarantee product quality, you will manage API and mobile testing. You will create and execute tests, debug and identify corrective actions, assess system requirements, and track quality assurance metrics (such as defect density and open defect counts). Furthermore, you should monitor all phases of software development to discover and fix bugs in the system and assist us in maintaining high-level quality of performance. As a startup company, we need a self-starter who is able to be very hands-on and effectively communicate with individuals at all levels within the organization. Being flexible and ready for change in our fast-growing organization is essential as well!


Responsibilities:

  • Prepare detailed- comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
  • Plan and coordinate testing activities- thoroughly identifying and documenting bugs
  • Cross-browser testing, all device testing, bug reporting, bug analysis
  • Review and analyze website, and optimize website performance
  • Help troubleshoot issues
  • Assess test results to predict user behavior, identify errors/bugs, and suggest solutions.
  • Provide detailed information about a defect/bug / error to developers in order to fix it
  • Propose software enhancements to better UI/UX performance
  • Strong logical reasoning and problem-solving skills.
  • Ensure timely project delivery by working closely with the product development and testing teams.


Requirements:

  • Relevant QA development experience of 3-4 years
  • Test Planning, Documentation, and Test Execution

details.description:
As a Senior Engineering Manager for GTM Frontend, you will be responsible for leading a team of engineers and overseeing the development, enhancement, and maintenance of routing algorithms and systems for mapping applications. You will play a critical role in driving innovation, ensuring high-quality routing solutions, and delivering an exceptional navigation experience to users.


Responsibilities:

  • Team Leadership and Management:
  • Lead and manage a team of engineers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support in their professional development.
  • Set clear goals, define project priorities, and allocate resources effectively to ensure the timely delivery of routing features and enhancements.
  • Foster a collaborative and high-performing team culture, encouraging knowledge sharing, innovation, and continuous improvement.
  • Technical Strategy and Roadmap:
  • Define and drive the technical roadmap for routing systems, aligning it with the overall product vision and business objectives.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in routing algorithms, mapping technologies, and geospatial data processing.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product management and data science, to identify opportunities for innovation and drive strategic initiatives.
  • System Design and Architecture:
  • Work closely with the team and other stakeholders to define the system architecture and design scalable, efficient, and reliable routing systems.
  • Ensure that the routing infrastructure can handle large-scale data processing, real-time updates, and dynamic optimization based on various factors like traffic, road conditions, and user preferences.
  • Implement best practices for system performance, scalability, and fault tolerance.
  • Algorithm Development and Optimization:
  • Lead the research, development, and optimization of routing algorithms to provide accurate and efficient navigation directions.
  • Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to leverage geospatial data, machine learning, and statistical modeling techniques to improve routing accuracy and user experience.
  • Continuously monitor and analyze routing performance metrics to identify areas for improvement and implement data-driven optimizations.
  • Quality Assurance and Testing:
  • Establish and maintain robust testing processes to ensure the reliability and accuracy of routing systems.
  • Define and implement automated testing frameworks and methodologies to efficiently validate routing algorithms, data inputs, and outputs.
  • Collaborate with QA teams to conduct performance evaluations, identify and resolve issues, and ensure adherence to quality standards.
  • Collaboration and Communication:
  • Collaborate closely with product management, design, operations, and other engineering teams to align priorities, requirements, and timelines.
  • Effectively communicate project updates, technical concepts, and challenges to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Foster effective cross-team collaboration, leveraging agile methodologies and fostering a culture of transparency and accountability.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Extensive experience in software engineering, with a focus on routing algorithms, mapping, or geospatial technologies.
  • Proven experience in leading and managing engineering teams, preferably in the maps/navigation domain.
  • Strong technical background in system design, architecture, and performance optimization.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++.
  • Experience with geospatial libraries, tools, and data formats (e. g., GIS, OpenStreetMap, GeoJSON) is highly desirable.
  • Familiarity with machine learning, statistical modeling, or data analytics is a plus.
  • Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills.

  • Where you'll be working
  • In this hybrid role, you'll have a defined work location that includes work from home and assigned office days set by your manager.
  • Responsible for conceiving, specifying, designing, programming, documenting, testing, and bug fixing involved in creating and maintaining software components.
  • Lead discussions with the business to determine the requirements and design of large-scale software systems and services that best meets the needs of the business.
  • Determine the structure, design, and scope of the software systems and services, utilising the necessary programming languages.
  • Develop the initial design and testing framework, verifying that the design meets requirements and implementing into production.
  • Provides guidance and standards for resolving issues that occur during the programming and design of the software.
  • Ensure that the project is completed within the specified timeframe, prioritising resources to ensure objectives are being met.
  • Identify software integration requirements for production deployment and lead integration discussions with internal/external impacted partners.
  • Oversee development of the software to ensure the software implementation meets the design and integration requirements.
  • Work with identified stakeholders to lead the production deployment and acceptance handoff of the software.
  • Ensure tight privacy, compliance and security controls are maintained in all the frameworks.
  • Mentors less experienced engineers in the team.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience.
  • Four or more years of relevant work experience.
  • Three or more years of Experience in Full Stack Developer (Java, Angular, React Js).
  • Three or more years of Experience in HTML, CSS, java scripting
  • Experience in implementing Object Oriented Web Programming and exposure to TypeScript, JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the object models.
  • Experience in creating configuration, build, and test scripts for Continuous Integration environments.
  • Experience in DevOps methodology, tools, techniques, and mindset.
  • Experience in Agile methodologies and SSDLC implementation.
  • Experience in design and implementation of Microservices and IaaS infrastructure based on AWS Code Deploy, Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, etc.
  • Experience working in App technologies
  • Experience in working on Large Scale Enterprise applications.
  • If Verizon and this role sound like a fit for you, we encourage you to apply even if you don't meet every even better qualification listed above.
details.title: Architect
